message: Let's start with a fair split and see where we go from here.
I'll start with a slightly biased offer, see how you like it
That's a bit too generous to you, Bob. I'm not ready to give up 80% of the money yet.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more
I'm not willing to give up 70% of the money, Bob. You're not getting that big of a chunk of the pie that easily.
I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I'm getting closer to your middle ground, but I think I'm worth a bit more
You're getting closer, but 60% is still too much for me. I'm not willing to give up that much.
I'm going back to my original fair split. I think this is a reasonable and balanced offer. Will you accept it this time?
